sentences.en: At birth, a normal human infant is less mature than infants of some other primate species, possibly to allow the disproportionately large head to fit through a pelvis adapted for walking on two legs.

sentences.en: However, if you have pain in only one of your hips, you probably have either an uneven pelvis or unequal leg lengths.
